name: Dorry and it's Worry
description:
https://youtu.be/EXJDMbwOCp

 An interactable game made more kids below ten, The game addresses mental health problems such as worrying, anxiety and fear. This game can help children make better choices and teach them how important it is to communicate rather than carrying thoughts that harm the development of kids.

Dorry loves being happy. Until, one day, she finds a worry. At first it's not such a big Worry, but then it starts to grow. Every day, it grows larger and larger, making Ruby unhappy. How can Ruby get rid of it and feel like herself again
